meanings.definition: A type of cracker made with salt.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy snacking on saltines with cheese.
meanings.sent2: My mom always packs saltines in my lunchbox.
meanings.sent3: The saltines were so salty, they made me pucker my lips.
meanings.sent4: The crunch of the saltines echoed through the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The saltines crumbled in my hand, leaving a trail of salt behind.

meanings.sent1: During the picnic, we munched on saltines and grapes.
meanings.sent2: The kids love to dip their saltines in peanut butter.
meanings.sent3: I pretended the saltines were tiny boats sailing in my soup.
meanings.sent4: The saltines were as delicate as a butterfly's wings.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the saltines was music to my ears.
